name: Zecury
description:
Zecury is a Ludum Dare 42 game made by FinGames.

In this game you play as a researcher who has been sent to planet Zecury for research purposes. Suddenly the planet starts to collapse. You need to find a way to get out of the collapsing planet by completing tasks before it is too late.

This game was made by FinGames and we would love to get some feedback.

The game is designed for resolution 1920x1080.

Website: http://fingames0.webnode.fi/
